The t-shirts go with anything and are ready for any situation.', 'I was a little bit worried about how durable would be the material but so far no complaints.']}, "Boys' Stay Dry Climalite Short Sleeve T-Shirt": {'price': 13.3, 'brand': 'Adidas', 'category': 'Sports', 'product_id': 'P031', 'rating': 4.7, 'reviews': ['Super comfortable material, fit is true to size (see size chart and trust it). Loose fit. You have to pay attention to what type of shirt you are buying for sportswear. This is loose fit, not meant to be tight. Holds up after multiple washes, great value for the price. I re-buy every time one in a different color is available. The polyester mix material is great for people with sensitive skin. It is also light weight and breathable for hot days.', 'Excellent t-shirt from [Brand Name]!
